name: Swiss Run
description:
Description

Get ready to drive through the Swiss Hills in Swiss Run!!. Using nothing but your reflexes, skills and speed. Swiss Run is a driving in which you control a convertible from a third-person perspective. The main goal is to dodge different obstacles and set your best time!
Control 

  • Space / Enter / Start: Start the game, restart after death or victory
  • Escape: Quit Game
  • W / Up: Accelerate
  • S / Down: Brake
  • AD / Left and Right: Drift. You can drift more efficiently if you slow down a bit!

Features:

  • A mix of old good racing games and a unique 2D style.
  • Enjoy yourself travelling around one of the most beautiful countries in the world.
  • Live the pandemic dream! Travelling without money!
  • A fantastic music experience.

Authors

  • HypercubeCore
  • LadyHappy
  • Mark
  • Forameuss

Follow us on 🐤 Twitter to hear about updates!
